Room.Name: Regalia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Regalia Drive, west of Oceancrest Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Regalia Drive intersects Oceanview Drive to the east. On the south, you can see the stage area of the Oceancrest Public Amphitheatre. The Amphitheatre is used by the public for general gatherings, usually after dusk, where people can come to relax and listen to the bards and minstrels play their mandolins.
